      • Serialized Fields

        • dob
          Date dob
        • dod
          Date dod
        • father
          Person father
        • fatherId
          int fatherId
          The id of this person's father. We need this for the parsers who read a person's id before the Person is created.
        • firstName
          String firstName
        • gender
          Person.Gender gender
        • id
          int id
        • lastName
          String lastName
        • marriages
          Collection<Marriage> marriages
        • middleName
          String middleName
        • mother
          Person mother
        • motherId
          int motherId
          The id of this person's mother. We need this for the parsers who read a person's id before the Person is created.

    • Class edu.pdx.cs410J.family.XmlRemoteFamilyTree

      class XmlRemoteFamilyTree extends UnicastRemoteObject implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • highestId
          int highestId
          The highest id in the family tree
        • remoteMarriages
          Map<Long,RemoteMarriage> remoteMarriages
          Maps a Long that represents the husband and wife to their RemoteMarriage
        • remotePersons
          Map<Integer,RemotePerson> remotePersons
          Maps ids to their RemotePerson. This way there is always a one-to-one correspondence between a Person and a RemotePerson
